response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its importance to me, I am considering offering it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $12,000. I understand its worth to you is $10,000, but I hope this offer presents a mutually beneficial solution. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
